verses.text:
Two lit-tle hands to work for Je-sus, Our lit-tle tongues His praise to tell, Two lit-tle ears to hear His mes-sage,
Two lit-tle lips to do His will, Two lit-tle eyes to read His sto-ry, Two lit-tle hearts to love Him best.

Two lit-tle feet to walk His path-way, Two lit-tle minds to think His will,
Two lit-tle souls to give Him glo-ry, Two lit-tle hearts to love Him still.
